code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SearchBar=()=>{const[query,setQuery]=useState("");const navigate=useNavigate();const handleSearch=()=>{navigate("/search?query=".concat(query));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex gap-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:"border p-2",placeholder:"Search for cars...",value:query,onChange:e=>setQuery(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"bg-blue-500 text-white p-2",onClick:handleSearch,children:"Search"})]});};export default SearchBar;
